detail_desc: Dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Skirt in an airy, checked viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and open chest pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in a viscose weave with decorative trims on the shoulders. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated, frilled trim at the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke, side pockets and an elasticated waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Unlined.
Shirt in a supersoft viscose weave with a collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem, and a decorative bow at the front of the hem.
Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.

Blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and a wrapover front with a press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem with a decorative bow.
Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, decorative buttons down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, braided shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated, frilled trim at the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Short, tie-hem shirt in a lightweight viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and a wrapover front with a press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem with a decorative bow.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a supersoft viscose weave with a collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
